65b7(1): pa'i chos 'dul slal tshangs 'ang pyod pa spyad snyam nas dong ngo // de nas gnas brtan sha ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzho nur gyurd pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod 'di ltar sems can rnams kyis chos kun shes par 'gyur
65b8(1): 'ang bya ba'i phyir chos myi bston da tam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa btsun pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ dge slong lnga brgya po de se dag stan las langs nas/ bya smod mya bstan pa zer zhing dong ngo // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
65b9(1): bcun bau sha ri'i bu gang gi phyir dge slong lnga brgya po de dag la 'di skad ces/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa myi lta'o// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa myi nyan to// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa gang na gnas pa'i phyogs de yang spang bar bya/ 
65b10(1): me med ba de ni leg sa so// legs so// sha ri'i bu dge slong de dag gi tshig de ni legs par smras so// ni ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal gzho nung gyu nga la ni yod pa ma yin te/ dbyigs su byed do// 
66a1(1): bi de dag sa 'jam dpal gzho nur gyurd pas bstan pa 'di thos pa dang / slar phyogs te log nas/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyun pa la 'di skad ces so// 'jam dpas bdag cag ni ji ltar khyod kyis bstand pa de ltar
66a2(1): myi shes so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ dge slong dag legs so// legs so// de lta bu ni stonod pa'i nyan thos rnams kyis byas pa ste/ dge slong dag 'di la kun shes par bya ba myed/ rnam par shes pa bya ba myed do/ 
66a3(1): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings 'do na gnas myed pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa nyid do// chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de/ dbyings ma yin no// de ni yod pa ma yin te/ dmyigs su byed
66a4(1): cing / gsol ba myed la/ 'thi'apho myed do// gang g.yog myed cing 'pho ba byed te de/ kun shes par bya ba pa ma yin/ rnamapa shes par bya ba ma yin no// gang kun shes par bya ba dang / nam
66a5(1): par shes par bya ba'i rlom sems byed pa de ni tonang pa'i nyan thos shes dang byas/ mchog thob pa zhes bya/ gtso bo zhes bya// sbyin gnas zhes byab/ bstan pa 'di bshad pa ba na/ dge slong lnga brgya po de dag las dge
66a6(1): slong bzhi pa s+ya ni lend pa byed par 'ag pa rnams las sems rnam par gros so// dge slong brgya na sems cher 'khrugs nas/ lus de nyid dang sems can dmyal ba chen po yu 'bod du ltung ngo // de nas
66a7(1): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzho nur gyurd pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod sems can rjes su bsrung ba'i chos kyi stonod pas/ dge slong brgya pa de dag ni chud pos te mtshar
66a8(1): byas so// de nas bcom 'das kyis gnas brtan sha ri'i bu la 'di rjes bka' sA yang to// rga ri'i bu khyod 'di skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na sha ri'i bu dge slong brgya po de dag sems dmyal ba chen po du 'bod
66b1(1): tu reg pa thang cig reg nas dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / skul pa btam par smra bar 'gyung na/ sha ri'i brags te dge slong de dag nas chos kyin ma grangs 'di ma thos su 'ad na/ de dag gdon gyi ma bar semasu byal par sakra
66b2(1): par 'gyur te/ las de zad nas/ phyir skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ de nas gos chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten pas// skald par sems can dmyal bar myod par 'gyur ba'i las de yang cung zad tsag
66b3(1): myong bar byas so// sha ri'i bu de'i phyir dge slong brgya po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i nyan thos log 'a 'dus par dgra bcom pa mag la zang par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na chos kyi napa
66b4(1): grangs 'di so so nyid dang bcas par thos pa ni dam pa yin gyi/ bsam gtan bzhi ma la snyoms par zhugs pas ni de lta ma yin/ tshad myed pa bzhino de sgyu ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgom sa
66b5(1): bas ni de lta ma yin no// de tsa'i gyo zhe na// chos 'di lta bu ma khros pas 'khor ba las yongs su myi dgros// skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'tsho ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid byi bid
66b6(1): ba dang / 'khrug pa nams las yongs su bgros zhes bshad/ de nas tshe dang ldan gzha sa bug/ 'jam dpas gno sus su/ da pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'da' dpas sarda ltang se'as can
66b7(1): yongs su smyind par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs por bshad pa mngon par mtshar to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin nyid ni 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phelu ba ma yin/ 
66b8(1): chos kyi dbyings kyang 'bri la min/ 'obs pa ma yin no// sems can gyi khams la yang 'gro ba la yin // 'dres pa ma yin/ kun nas rkyen mongs pa ma yin/ rnam pa dbya ba ma yin no// de du'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ster ded/ 
66b9(1): na yod pa ma yin zhing / dmyigs su myed de/ ba snyad tsam du zad pas ni ser ma yin/ gang gi ma yin/ gang la yang phyi gnas te/ gnas pa byed do// btsun pa sha ro'i bu gang 'di ste bu'i myi 'gag pa de ni byang chub bo// byang chub
66b10(1): gang yin pa de ni tha dad pa'o// tha dad pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par myi rtog pa'o// gang rnam par myi rtog pa de ni khyo byed cing 'gyur ba byed do// gang gyi byed cing 'gyur ba myed pa de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o// de nas bcom ldan
67a1(1): dbyings de 'bri ba yang ma yin paphel ba yang ma dzin no// sems can gyi khams kyang 'bri' ma yin/ 'bol pa ma yid do// kun nas nyan mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin / de ci'i byor na na/ 'di lta de dag yod pa man
67a2(1): zhing dbyigs su byed de tha snyad tsam du zad pas ni ci yang ma yin/ gang gis m+b+ha yin/ gang la yang gyi gnas te/ gnas pa byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe// nga tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' ba rtsas to// 'das bdag
67a3(1): dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung chos brjod pa ni/ don gyis ma yin tha snyad tsam/ cig pa sna tshogs mtshan nyid myin/ mtshan nyid myed par gang rtogs pa de dgra de nyid ni mtshan nyid 'gyur/ mtshan nyid myed la rtog pa myed rtog pa nyid
67a4(1): kyang mtshan nyid myin// 'dus ma byas la gang rtog dang / mya ngan 'das nas gang rtog pa// gnyi ga bdud kyis las yin zhes/ de ni mkha / sa pa rnams kyis bshad/ phung po skye mched khams kyi rnams
67a5(1): sod mi nyi gzhin spyod yul lo// gang dag rtog pa de dag yod// rtog pa myed pa g.yol pa myed/ rtog pa rnams ni g.yol bar 'gyur/ rtog pa byed pa mya ngan 'da'/ gang gis rang bzhin 'di shes pa/ de ni ye shes ldan zhes
67a6(1): bya/ de phyir zad pa rjes su thod// den rtog byed ye shes so// ye shes brjod pa rnams kyang gsog/ ye shes 'di ltar gang brjod pa// de ni ye shes ldan zhes bya/ gang gis stong gsum 'di dag rnams/ dang
67a7(1): chen bkang rtse byin pa bas// gang gos dam chos 'di 'brel/ bzod pa de ni bzod pa chog/ bskal pe bye ba pas kyi yas su// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus bsam gtan bsnyen pas ni/ mad
67a8(1): sde 'di dang btungs ma yin chos 'di der theg pa 'di// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs/ mdo sde 'dis brten byas na/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na
67b1(1): par 'gyur te// de dag thams cad kyang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mye tog ces bya ba phying 'thung bar 'gyur ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi srung ba rgyad tu// bco
67b2(1): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' ya yad nas/ 'jam dpal gno nur gyudad pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / swa dang / gyi dang / lha ma yin// dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di rangar to// bcod ldan 'das rgyas
67b3(1): gsungs pa la mngon par bsod do// / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs na// / rgya gang skad du
67b4(1): kya med rjenam smra g+san du tra// 'od skad du/ 'phags pa rnam kyi tshul zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di na
67b5(1): bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi mtshal na/ bskyug ma las byasapa'i 'khor da kyi khyams na/ bzhugs te/ de'i tshe smyig ma yis byas
67b6(1): pa'i khor da kyi khyams su 'dus shing 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rab tu seng po dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis ji ltar gnas pa'i bya// ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ ji ltar rnal 'byor du bya// ji ltar ses
67b7(1): can rnams yongs su sbyind par bya snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpal rab tu mang po de dag gi bsam pa mkhyen nas/ smyig ma las byas pa'i 'khord kyi khyams ga la ba der gshegs
67b8(1): te byon nas/ gdan bting bas bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mang po de dag la 'di skad bka' stsastsal to// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod rgya
68a1(1): kyi tshul gang te byang chub sems dpa' 'apyod pa thams cad stod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas rgya chos bams cad brjod par byed pa de lta bu'i chos kyi chu ma ngas khyad la bshad do// bcam ldan 'das legs zhes bya 'o yo nas / byang cum
68a2(1): se'as dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyand pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces gsoyang to// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na bya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam ba cad du gyis shig/ 'khor bar spyod par rdzo
68a3(1): gyis shig/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dganas par ma byed cig/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa can dang / 'khor bar
68a4(1): sbyor ba can lags/ tsa star na 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa nes ya myi gnas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas su yang pag 'chi ba myed pa'i bde ba la reg pa'i phyir/ mya ngan las 'das
68a5(1): tha'i 'a'am pa cad srimed/ dge ba'i rtsa ba la sngags pa'i phyir 'khor pan spyod pa can yin/ 'phags pa dang ma ma'i skye bo dpa bskyed pa 'i byo sa 'khor ba dang bya ngan las 'das pa'as yang phyi gnas te/ de ni rdul lo// dag gcaH
68a6(1): kyi bu dag de bas na/ rang gi sems yongs su spyong shig/ pha rol tu kyi da pa sems bsrung shig sems dpal ba can du gyis shig/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang gi sems yongs su spyod pa
68a7(1): bar bgyid lags/ ji ltar sems gzhan gyi sems srung / ji ltar sems dpa' ba can lags/ bka' stsan sad pa/ nyon mongs pa sel pas/ rang gi sems yongs su myong bar byed pa yin/ khong khro ba byed pas gzhan gyi sdim
68a8(1): bsrung ba yid/ byang chub kyi ma ma myo gtong bas sem sa dpa' yin te/ de ni tshul so// rigs kyi thu dag de lta bsan bya ba yang 'gas par ma byed cig bya ba ma yin pa la yang ldang zar rgya nag / byas pas 'ad ba byed zer sa
68a9(1): shig/  gso'adapa bcom ldan 'das ji ltang dbyang chub sems dpa' rnams bgyi ba dang / gyi 'gal bar bgyid lags ji ltad na bgyis payan de ba ma mchis pa lags/ bka' bra la pa bya ba dang 'gol bar gyi bya ba ni sbyin cing
68b1(1): ze'ad par 'byung ba'i chos la 'jug zaT/ las kyirna 'a pad smin pa la yid ches par bya ba'o// sgrub pa yin pa la snang ba ni spyod rje cheng po la 'byug pa'o// byas pa la mnar pa spyod pa ni lan tu ban 'dogs pa de ba spyod pa
68b2(1): khye/ 'dini nus so// rinas kyi bu dag de lta bas na/ dus mi yin par na gyi snang shig// drub la baban ni ma nyal cig/ nyal pa rnams san thong gag/ tag tu nyis cig ga mngon pa/ bcom ldan 'das byer na byang chu ba coco
68b3(1): dpa' rnams dus ma lags par myi ldang ba lags/ ji ltar na dus la baban myi nyal ba lags/ ji ltar na nyal ba rnams slong ga lags/ ji ltar na rtag tu nyas pa lags bka' sa lad pa/ dus ma yin pa gyi ldang ba na snod du ma gyurd pa
68b4(1): nams la chos myi bstan pa'o// dus la bab na myi nyel ba ni sdod du gyurd pa las 'da' bar myi bya ba'o// nyal pa rnams bslang ba'i dus dang dus ma yin par bskus pa'o// rtag tu nyal ba ni nyon mongs par 'jug pa las kyi nyams pa
68b5(1): pa ste/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na/ yid brtan pa byed par gyis shig/ yid brtan pa 'jig par gyis shig/ yid ma brtan pa rnams la yid brtan par bgyis shig ces gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ 
68b6(1): byang chu'i sems dpa' rnams yid kyi bstonod pa lags / ji sted na 'di brtan pa 'jig pa bgyid pa lags/ ci ltang na yid 'badalen pa nams sa ya brtan pa lags bka' la 'dab/ yid kyi brtan ces durgya
68b7(1): ba ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms por 'jug pa rnams la yid bzhag go// yid brtan pa bzhig par bya ba na snyoms par 'jug pa la zlog pa'o// yidam brtan pa rnams la yid brtan par bya ba ni log par zhugs pa rnams la ste/ 
68b8(1): de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de bas na/ nor dang ldan par bgyis shig/ byas pa shes pa byed par spyod cig/ tsa la yang lan de bar ma byed cig/ rnyed par chen po nye bar 'chol bar gyis shig/ gso'o pa
68b9(1): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams nor dang ldan pa lags/ ji ltar na byas pa 'tshal pa ma mchis par spyod pa lags/ tsaM ltang na rje ma yang lam m+b+hi ba lags/ dri ltar na rnyed pa ched 'os
68b10(1): bar 'tshong ba lags/ bkal sartsal do pa/ nor dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ nor bdun dang ldan pa'o// byas pa shes pa myed pad spyar pa ni/ ser sna can rnams sbyin pa la spyad pa dang / shes rab 'tshasad pa rnams shes rab sa spyad par
69a1(1): bya mas ga dad mangs /  tshu ma can smra/  mas susman
69a2(1): kyi bu dag de bas na chags pa yang shes par gyis shig/ chags pa rnams la yang khyod cig chags pa la zhend pa rnams 'ang ltos shig/ chags pa myed pa la bsrungs shig/ gso'ad pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji lta bya chub
69a3(1): sems dpa' rnams chags pa 'tshal da pa lags/ ji ltar na chags pa rnams la spyod pa lags/ ji ltar chags pa zhen pa la blta ba lags/ ji ltar na chags pa ma mchis pa bsrung ba lags/ bka' saHkhad pa chags
69a4(1): ba shes par bya ba ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jus pa rnams so// chags pa rnams la spyad pa ni skye mched drug bcad pa'o// chags par zhen pa la lta ba ni so so'i skye bo yongs su smyind par bya ba'o// chags myed par
69a5(1): bzung ba ni skyon myed par gyi 'jug pa ste/ de ni tshul lo/  rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na/ 'jigs par gyis shig/ mngon da par dga' ba myed par gyis shig/ snying rtse ba myed par gyis shog/ b+hing
69a6(1): rje byed 'ang gyis shig /  g.yo'ad la/ bcom ldan 'das dri lta na byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jigs pa bgyi ba lag du ji ltab na mngon par dga' ba la mchis pa lags/ ji sted na mngon par dga'
69a7(1): 'am mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na snying rtse ba ma mchis pa la gas/ ji ltar na snying rdzabs ma mchis pa lags/ bka' saHlad pa/ 'jigs zhes bya ba ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis sa 'jigs pa'o// mngon par
69a8(1): dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la dga' ba myed pa'o// snying brtse ba byed pa ni phyi ro yod kyi dngos po rnams yongs su btang ba la'o// snying brje byed pa ni rang gi dngos po bgos
69a9(1): sogs pa yongs su btang ba la ste/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na/ bden pa la yang khob du chud par gyis shig/ brdzun tu smra pa yang ma spang shig/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems
69a10(1): dpa' rnams bden pa khong du chud par bgyid pa lags ji ltar na brdzun tu smra ba rgya spong ba la gas/ bka' sa kha pa/ bden pa khong du chud par bya ba ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'drus pa'i phyir ro// brdzun tu smra ba gyi sa
69a11(1): sus kyi nying kyang ngan 'ar dus sa de rigs kyi bud ni lce'i / bcos na byon pa de rgyang sdig tu di'i myang na 'das bas pan gyim zhig pa ringang su phyid papar byed ba gyi 'do
69b1(1): dgams pa ra rgya gan// galayod pa bcom 'du' di gyu na byang chub baman dpa ban pas pado 'a tu byed cing / rnam 'i drugapas pastsub gas/ dod pa 'ad pa da pa kyi rnya pa shA
69b2(1): rgya gas se lta ba lags/ bka' ya ya pa/ pha rolang tu phyind pa ni sems can thams cad kyi segs dang spyod pa dang / bsam pa la'o// tshul de 'od kyi dgas la smra ba ni sems can thams cad na yongs su sbyirnyed par bya ba'i phyir
69b3(1): ro/ pha ro la tu phyin dbang gyi bya ba ni/ pha rold du sprul pa'i phyiraro// pha rom kya dgas sa lA ba ni rAg tu mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol 'ar byaste/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na/ rtag tu myi badzun
69b4(1): par yab gyis lha/ rtsod pa myed pang mchog tu yang gyis shig/ byams pa chen po la gnas la skyon yang 'thong bad gyis shig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan padas ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag
69b5(1): mthum par bgyid pa dang / thod pas mchis pango mchog tu dgyid par lags/ ni ltar na byangs pa la gnas shing skyon yang mtho ba lags// bka' yul da pa/ rtag tu phyi mthun par byed pa ni/ dam pa'i chos yongs
69b6(1): mu gzung 'ang byung da rtsod pa ba byed pa marnon du byang pa nye b.las ba dag par gyur ro// bya'ang pa la gda' bar sems na yongs su bsgrub par gyur ro/ nyes pa mthong pa ni 'drus kya das pa
69b7(1): thams cad de/ de ni tshul so// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na zad par yang zad par ma byed cig/ myi zad pa yang ltung bar me ts+tsha gamyi zad pa'i chos nyid khong du bar gyis shig gso'ad ba/ bcom ldan 'an
69b8(1): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams zad pa zad par myi bgyid pa yang lags/ ji ltar na myi zad par myi ltung ba lags/ ci ltar na zad pa'i chos nyid khong du chud pa lags/ bka' sa khad pa/ zad pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus
69b9(1): byas so// myo 'ad pa zhes bya ba ni 'dul ma byas so// de la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i phyir 'dus byas kyang zad par gyi bya'o// thabs la yakhas pas 'dus bya bu yang srung bar gyi bya'o// zang ni/ 
69b10(1): chos nyid khong du chud par bya ba ni/ myi rtag pa'i mjur 'gyur ba ste/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de b+has na/ thun pa'i nang na yang gnas par gyis shig/ snang ba yang zin pam gyis shig kyi bya ba ni rgyos shin
70a1(1): bya ba ni yal bar gzhog pa lags/ bka' bsal pa/ mun pa zhes bya ba na myo zhes pa ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can gyi shes pa rnams kyi don tu bden pa thob par bya'o// snang ba nas
70a2(1): bya ba ni shes pan ste/ shes rab des kyang mun pa 'asal bar bya'o// myi bya ba zhes pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o// bya ba zhes bya ba mngon par 'du bya ba byed pa'o// de byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis las par bzhag par bya'o// rdon
70a3(1): tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na zab so'i chos ni snang ba la yang gnas par gyis shig/ snang ba'i chos rnams la yang brnyas par ma byed cig/ snang ba dang gyi snang ba la yang ma gnas shig/ gso lad pa bcom ldan 'das ji
70a4(1): thang da/  byang chuba'i mam dpa rnams rnab 'i tshi tu blang ba ma gnas pa 'gas/ ji hud na ldang ra gyu 'a'athos na' la brgyan pas na lagang/ ji bya ldang dang byi snang bas kyi gdas pa lags khas
70a5(1): 'dab / pa' ces bya ba ni nyid cing 'bres dpar 'byung ba te de skyes byang chub se'as dpa' nalas kyis ga pa mtha' pad dang bral ba son lab 'asbyin cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di bam rig par byal cho
70a6(1): gang dag rtend cing 'brelang par 'byung bas snang bar gyu dad pa de dag la yang sems can yongs su smyind par bya ba'i phyir/ brnyas par myi bya'o// snang bar dang myi snang ba la gnas par myi bya ba ni gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir te/ de ni tshul yod/ rigs
70a7(1): kyi bu dag de lta bas na gang yang dag par bsdub par bya ba de la 'dod pa myed par gyis shig/ yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir yang brtson 'grus ma klod cig/ gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams gang yang
70a8(1): dag pad bsgru bang 'gyi ba de la 'dod pa la 'tshas pa sags/ ji sta na yang ngan par bcu na brgya ga srid kyi/ brtson 'gras rjo bang gyi babyin pa gnas// bgalas 'das/ yang dan par bcu ba zhes bya ba da dge
70a9(1): ba rnams so// de la 'dod pa byed pa ni gyi lta bar sems can rnams la gtad ba'o// yang dag par skul ba la brtson 'grus spyi lhod pa ni dge ba'i cha ba la joms kyi shes par brtson par bya ste/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu
70b1(1): bya ba na/ byas pa ma ma la skye mchos dang / 'dre bar bya ste/ den tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na/ sam las gi zung bar rgya shig/ sa ma gos pan yang snang rgya zhig/ yang dag pa
70b2(1): ma dor cig/ gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams lam las brgyud pa lags/ ji ltar na lam gol ba na yang gda' ba lags/ ji ltar na yang dag pa'i lam gyi 'dod pa lags
70b3(1): bka' ma khad pa/ yam las 'dzur ba zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam las byol ba'o// lamra gol ba na snad pa ni sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i phyir ro// yang dag pa'i lam ni myi
70b4(1): dong ba ni 'di lta steg pha robang tu phyind pa drug gi sem ste/ den tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na phyir gyi ldog pa'i go cha yang 'gro bar gyis shig thams cad las kyang phying pa ldog par gyis shin
70b5(1): ji ltar na phyir ldog la dis sgrol kha lags/ bka' sastsald pa/ phyed phyi ldog pa'i go cha kos pa zhes bya ba ni/ chos dang mthun pa'i dam bcas pa'i la gnas pa'o// thams cad las phyir kyi ldog pa ni chos
70b6(1): rab kyi ldan 'a'i dab rtsub pa ldog pa'o// phyir myi ldog nas bsgral pa ni phyi dge ba'i chos thams cad las khrog pa ste/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na de 'dus par gyis shig/ rtag tu bye bar gyis shin
70b7(1): brgyad 'bod gyi zhin sha zla rgod par gyis shig/ gso yod bu ga bcom ldan 'das ji lta na byang chub sems dpa' nalasang 'gyur ba/ lags pa ji star na rtag tu bye ba lags/ ji ltang brgyad bu sa ga/ ji lta na thA nod pa
70b8(1): na/ sas sa mda' 'dun pa zhes bya la ni yun payin ci banan ma ldadu / rtag tu sbyin nagacasanami gcig tu 'dun pa dbyigad pa'i sems gan dang gan gesung so na par 'gru papa rnan na
71a1(1): ka bsdu' ba rgya zhigs byab pa gyi gso' bar yang gyis shin ka gsayod pa bcom ldan 'das ci snang na byang chub sems dpas nas pa rnaMs bu chags pamags da ska tug tsun 'tham pa'i gas/ ni sbyi na
71a2(1): ring por blta ba lags/ ji ltar na byas pa myi gzo' ba lags/ rjes su chags pa zhes bya ba ni/ theg pa chen po la'o// zhe 'gras pa'o zhes bya ba ni theg pa 'daman pa la'o// yun ring 'od lta ba la ni 'khor ba'i yongs su
71a3(1): bzung ba'i phyir ro/ byas pa ma gzo' ba ni sdig pa byas pa rnams la phyir lan myi glon pa s+ho ka de ni tshus so// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na gtong ba yang shin tu zong shig/ ser sna can du yang gyis shig/ 'dzag
71a4(1): rten pa'i sems da kyang myed par gyis shig/ gsol pa bcom / ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams gtong ba shin/ tu gtong ba lags/ ji ltar na sde sna can lags/ rtsi ster na 'dzin
71a5(1): pa'i sems cad la mnyam pa sags/ bka' da pa/ gtong gnad tu gtang ldan mems can 'ams ngan yongs su gyi gtong bal phyi sbyin la gtang ba'o// med gA cang bya ba sam snod byal byu dad pa rnams la'o/ 
71a6(1): 'dzind pa myed pa'i sems su bya ba ni chos la slob dpon gyi dpe' khyud myed pa'i phyir te/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na/ gang dag spangs pa de dag ni yongs su bzung zhing // gang dag yangs pa/ gang
71a7(1): dag yongs su bzung ba de dag ni ma la khad zhog shig/ nad pa ltar yang gyis shig/ na ba rnams kyang gsos shig/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltad na byang chub sems dpa' rnams gang dag spangs pa de dag
71a8(1): sa su 'dzi pa lags/ me ga na gang das yongs su bzung ba de dag sa sa thang 'don ga khanan rnaM sna na nad pa stang bu bya da pa sa gas byang dang ba rnams kyang mam gas ras na
71b1(1): pa / gang dag spangs pa de dag yongs su gzung ba ni/ log pa nyid du nges pas sems can sangs rgyas thams cad kyis spangs pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sa yongs su gzung bar bya'o// gang dag yongs su bzung
71b2(1): pa de dag yal bang bzhag pa na slob pa/ myi slob pa thams cad yongs su/ nad pa ltar yang byang zhingan pa rnams kyang g.yo 'ang bya ba bsam pa bzhin du rga ba dang na ba bstan nas/ ma po'i zla ba'i rnaba' la chos 'byan
71b3(1): 'a/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na bdud kyi las rnams ni/ 'bam ngas kyis shig/ sadan rgyas kyi chos rnams ni zhi bar gyis shig/ gsos pa bcom ldan 'das ci stad ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
71b4(1): bdud kying las rnams ni/ 'bar bar gyid pa klas/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni zhi bar 'gyid pa lags/ bka' sa mya khang pA/ bdud kyi las 'bang bar byed pa ni/ dge ba'i chos la 'artson pa rnam
71b5(1): ma'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni 'ang byed pa dachos 'angs/ 'i cad nyan mongs pa dang ni lte bu'i nyon mongs pa byed par spyod pa bye/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta 'gran/ bdud namar nga 'thas 'as
71b6(1): phyis shig ton pa ni mchos cig/ gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud dang 'thab pa lags/ rje lta na nyond pa kyi tshol ba lags/ bka' sa 'da'/ bdud dang 'thad par
71b7(1): bya khA ni byang chub sems dpa' dag gang gi tshe/ sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par byed pa de'i tshe bang chad bya ba'i dud tshol zhing brtson par byed pa na'o// ston pa myi tshol ba ni dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa ste/ de ni chul mo
71b8(1): rigs kyi dag de lta bas na/ gang dag nyan thos kyis smad par bya ba de khyed kyis ma smad cig/ gang la nyan thos mngon par dga' bar ma byed cig/ gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams gang dag
72a1(1): nyan don kyang ga nang na rgya ba dag pa bya ba pa man pa rde gang dugangam nyan sa dga' das kyi dga' 'asregs la dang/ ta rdzu kyi lci ba'i gan rnams la de/ de dag rkyen gyis spang ba tu byar
72a2(1): pas nar mang bu mya ngan las 'da'a' la/ sangan da dgapan/ des khyed kyis mngon pa dga' sa rgya/ den rgyal ma rigs kyi bu dag de lta bzhi na/ 'dzig pa sa gnas pamargyaman na// 'jig rkyen
72a3(1): rnabs myong bar gyis shig/ 'jig rten gyis kyang ma gos par gyis shig/ 'jig rten na thogs pa rnams kyang sgrol cig/ gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten na gnas
72a4(1): ba lags/ ji ltar na 'jig rten gyi chos rnams myong ba lags/ ci snyeng na 'jig rten gyis myi gos pa lags/ ci steng na 'jig rten 'thogs pa sgrol ba lags/ bga' la yad pa/ 'jig rten na gnas par byan
72a5(1): 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs myed par 'gyur do// 'jig rten gyi chos rnams myong bar bya ba ni 'jig rten rgya chos brgyad po dag go// 'jig rten gyis byi gos par bya ba ni bde ba dang
72a6(1): sdug bsngar gyis kyi 'askyod pa'i phyir ro// 'jig rten du thogs pa bsgrub pa'i phyir ni ste'ams sus bcod pa nas 'don ba ste/ de ni tshul so// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na/ yang bang gyi
72a7(1): nag/ lci ba gyis shig thug bsngal bar gyis shig/ 'de' bo gyis shig/ gsoyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi skyem na byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang ba lags/ ji snyed na lci ba sags ji ltad na sdug bsngar
72a8(1): b.lags/ cis na 'dI ba sags/ bka' ga 'dab/ yang ba ni sems can thams cad kyi byam gyi sod pa la lta las su byed pa'o/ na tshu lani yi la la brtan 'gro/ thug bsngal par bya ba ni gyi mthun 'a'i gnyen pa
72a9(1): rnams sa'o// 'da' 'am bya 'o na bsod napas byas pa'i phyir te/ de tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de bstan/ phyi snang 'ang yang kyi lashig/ thams cad du snang bar yang gyis zhin/ byol bar bya ga nas la laman
72a10(1): byol cig/ bsdad par bya ba rnams sdod cig/ gsol da'i/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltad na byang chub sems dpa' rnams na myi 'da' ba yang lags/ ji snyam na thams cad du gda' ba yang lags/ ji ltar na byos pa
72b1(1): bar bya ba'i phyir te/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na/ ma byas pa rnams la'ang gnal 'ar gyis shig/ byas pa rnams la 'ang gnas par gyim zhig/ byas pa dang ma byas pa nas smra la 'ang se 'ams na
72b2(1): bar gyis shig/ gsold la/ bcom ldan 'das ji skad na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma bgyis pa rnams la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na bgyis pa rnams la yang gnas pa lags// ji ltar na bgyis pa ma bgyis
72b3(1): pa rnams la 'ang sems mnyam la lags/ bka' ma lad pa su byas pa rnams la gnas pa ni/ dge ba'i rtse ba yang dag par bskyab pa'i phyir ro// byas pa rnams la gnas pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba byas pa de'i gang na
72b4(1): dang thun par byangan byed de/ byas pa dang 'bya yan byams pa'as su ses pa mnyam par byab rgyal 'i da kaunadapa dang / rgyas 'das pam 'di gsas rtse ba byed pa
72b5(1): shes su bya ba ste/ dan tshus so// rigs kyi bu dag de lta das rten snyi pa myed pa las kyang snying po tshol cig/ snying po la yang snyi po byed pa 'i bcu shes bskyed cig// snying po dang / snying pa myung ba skyed/ 
72b6(1): pa rang yang pyod cig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po ma mchis pa las/ snying po tshol ba lags/ ji snyam na snying po la snying ma mchis par 'du shes bskyed pa las/ 
72b7(1): jilta bying pos mchi par spyod pa sags/ ga na ma byed par bya ba ni sus dang / thog dang / mangs spyod dam te/ de 'ang mamananan yongs su rdzogs par bya ba sa ma
72b8(1): btsal bar bya'o// snying po zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzung ba'i phyir/ de la snying po ma yin pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// snying po dang snying po ma yin
73a1(1): bar gyis shig/ tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la ltos shig/ tshul khrims dang ldan 'a rnams ni yal par zhog shig/ gsold pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dam bcas pa nyams
73a2(1): bar bgyid pa lags/ ci sta ngan tshul khrims ma nyazhes pa lags/ ci sta ngan tshul khrims 'cha yod pa rnams la lta ba lags/ rtsi ltar na tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams yal bar gnog pa lags/ bka'
73a3(1): ba/ da' bcas pa'i nyams par bya ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bgong ma dang gong ma la ldog pa dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// tshul khrims ma nyams parabya ba ni byang chub sems la lhag par dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// tshul khrims
73a4(1): 'cha' dbang rnams la sa pa ni tshul khrims dang spyang bam phyir ro/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la yal ba bzhag pa ni bya ba rdo/ byas par phyi // de ni tshul lo// 8/ rigs kyi kyi bu dag de ka bdun
73a5(1): gzhan gyi nong la dga' ba gyis shig/ rang gi nong la yongs su nga shig/ nye bar gnas pam gyis shig/ gsoyo pa bcom ldan 'das rdo ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams gzhan gyi nong la dga' ba lags
73a6(1): ci ltar na rang gi nor yongs su gtong ba lags/ rtsi ltan na nye bar gnas pa lagasabaka' stsal pa/ gzhan gyi nod la mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs
73a7(1): rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yid rang bar bya'o// rang gi nor yongs su gtong ba ni rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams tu sems can thams cad la yongs su gtang bar bya'o// nye bar gnas
73a8(1): par bya ba ni byang chub yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir te/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na/ mchog tu phyind pad yang gyis shig/ sems dma' bar yang gyis shig/ le lo can du yang gyis shig/ rtag tu
73a9(1): brtson par gyis zhig/ gsosod ma com ldan 'das ni ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams chog tu byin pa sags/ ni b+ha da se ma dun ra bas 'di/ ji ltad na la so can 'gas/ ji phyi na rtag tu brtson pa lags pa
73b1(1): phab bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' myi mun pa lags/ ji ltar na dul ba'i sa na gnas pa lags/ ji ltam na 'jigs pa legs/ ci ltar na seng ge'i thal gyis nas par gnonon pa lags/ bka'
73b2(1): 'da' kyi byud par bya ba ni bdud bams cad 'phral ba'i phyi nga// bdus pa'i ma 'a gnas pani mim can cadags cad yul das phyir ro// 'jigs rang bya ba ni dzin pa sem pad 'ba'o// khan la can
73b3(1): rnam par gnon par bya ba ni// phas kyi rgol ba thams cad spa dbab pa'i phyir te/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na/ yid du 'ong ba'i yang khyis shig/ yid du gyi 'ong bar gyis shig/ blad du byed par yang
73b4(1): rtsa lta na sAd rA ma mchis pa lags/ bka' sa kha pa/ yid nu 'ong bar bya ba zhin/ yon tan gyis phyug pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi thugs byon pa'o// yid du gyi 'od mngon par shes pa thams cad
73b5(1): kyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i phyir// bdud thams cad kyi yid du myi 'ong ba'o// smad du byed pa ni lus dang / ngag dang yid yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ smad du yod pa ni myi dge ba bcu'i chos thams cad ni smod pa'i
73b6(1): byor te/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta 'os na// rma mabyung ba rnams kha mas byung ba shig/ ye shes tshol cig/ ye shes kyi bya ba rnams la dga' bam ma byed cig/ gso'adab bcom ldan
73b7(1): 'da' jig na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam sa las kyi 'byin pa sags// ji snyed na ma'abyung ba rnams lu sa rgya phyidang pa lags ji ltad na se shes sol ba lags na ye zhes kyi bgyi ba rnams byinas
74a1(1): lags bka' la 'das/ mabyung ba rnams kyis gyu ban nyan popa dang nga 'angasargyas dus bya'o/ samabyang bdasas nas bya ba rnam ma cwa ma da don
74a2(1): bar bya'o// ye shes btsal bar bya ba ni med pa dang / kyai skye ba shes pa'o// ye shes bya ba la dka' bar gyi bya ba ni 'dus pa byas su srung bar byi bya ba ste/ de ni rdum mo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas nag mnyam par
74a3(1): gzhag 'ab yang gyis shig/ sems nas par g.yeng bar brgyas shog/ sems pa myi gnas par yang khyis shig/ rtag chu btang snyoms la zhugs par sab gyis shig/ gso'ad pa/ bcom ldan
74a4(1): 'das ji lta na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyam par gzhag pa lags/ ji lta na sems nas bdag yeng ba bgyod pa lags/ rdo spyar na sems kyi gnas pa laga'/ dag+har nang rtag tu sto pa bang
74a5(1): zhunas pa lags/ bka' sa lad pa/ mnyam par gzhand pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyis so// sems rnams par g.ye pa'ang bya ba ni nyan tho kyi sems lag so// phyo gnas pa ni de
74a6(1): sa ma lags phyir ro// rtag tu snyoms 'ang zhugs pa ni sem sa can rnams can la ni sems mnyam pa'i phyir te// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na/ sreg par bya ba ni sreg shig/ cigs
74a7(1): ni bskyed cig/ skyes pa ni thog shig/ rnam pa daphye ba ni skus shig// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsreg 'ang 'gyi ba bsreg pa lags/ ji lta na tshig pa
74a8(1): rnams bskyed pa lags// ji lta na skyes pa rnams gtong ba lags/ TI ltad na nam 'ang bye ba rnalas srus pa lags/ 'ga' la 'ad pa/ bsreg par bya ba sdig pan nyan tshangs pa thams cad shes ra
74a9(1): kyi bems 'asreg pa'o// tshig pa bskyed pa ni thams cad kyis phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched nama' gzung ba'o// skyes nas gtong ba ni sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod pa la snying las
74a10(1): bus byas pa'o// rnam par phye ba bsdus pa zhes bya ba de ni yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga gdags so// rigs kyi bu de blta bas na dus su yin pa 'in dus su shes par gyis shig/ dus ni dus ma yin par shes
74b1(1): par rgya lanas/ dus dang dums yo pa 'kham pan yang kyis shig/ sa dzad pa maldan 'ad na byang rnaba'i sa dpa sa dus 'asugs pas sus su 'a 'dab
74b2(1): na dus ma lags par 'tshal da pa lags/ ci ltar dus dang dus ma lags par la mkhas pa lags/ bka' saHlad pa/ gang nyan thos kyis thob par bya ba'i dus de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dus ma yinan
74b3(1): pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ste// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i dus so// dus dang rus
74b4(1): ma yin pa la mkhas par bya ba ni dus bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na/ 'byor pa ni phyi shig/ ma 'byobyod bran byedad cig/ 'byod/ 
74b5(1): dpal 'byadad pa 'chags par yang ma byed cig/ gsol na/  tha/ bcom ldan 'das jisnyan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'byor du pa 'byed pa lags/ ji ltam nam 'bye dem spyod pa lags
74b6(1): bar bya'o// ma 'byor pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyas bzhin du yid la bya ba ma/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sa srung bar bye/ ro// 'byoran pa dang myi 'byod pa sa chags par bya bya ba ni ldan
74b7(1): byos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang / sa so'i spyi zan pyod pa la ma chags par bya ba ste/ de ni tshul mo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na/ dbugs 'byind pa rnams ni dbugs pa byung shig/ 
74b8(1): dbugs pa phyind pa rnabs ni dbugs phyung shig// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dbugs 'byind pa rnams dbugs kyi 'byin pa lags/ ri ltar na dbu
74b9(1): na gyi dngad pa rnams dbugs patsund pa lags/ dka' sad pa/ dbugs 'byid pa rnams dbugs rgya 'byung ba ni yongs su spyod pa'i sems can rnams yongs su surnyed par bya bya'o// dbugs ma byin
75a1(1): pa rnams dbugaso 'byung ba ni yongs su ma sbyind pa'i sems can rnams yongs su sbyind pa bya ba ste/ de ni tshul lo// // rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na/ rma byung bar yang gyis shig ma smras pa
75a2(1): par yang kyis zhig/ ma byung ba rnam sa rnams par myom shi ga// ma 'byung ba rnams ni ma'i byung 'i gyis zhig/ gas 'a sa com ldan 'das ji stad na byang chub sems dpa' ma 'byin pa sag 'di lta
75a3(1): na ma sbas pa lagasaji ltar na rdza ma 'byung ba rnams gsol ba lugs/ ji ltar na rdzam byungal gyi 'byind pa lagase// bka' ya lad pa/ rma byung ba ni yan lag dang / rtang lag yongs su gtang bas phyid
75a4(1): ro// sa sbal par bya ba ni sems kyi ro// 'byung ba nalas med gso ba ni/ sung ba rnam mchog bzhin du brtsos 'a'o// rab zung bsam gyi srung ngan srog gi yang bathab pa 'as 'gas
75a5(1): par gyi bya ba ni/ den tshus so// rigs kyi bu dag de sa 'am/ nye bar 'tho bar byed par lang rgyas shig/ sems can naman nye bar 'tshob yang kyi shika/ ba b.lags pa na'as/ 
75a6(1): kyang chud ma gzan shig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams nye bur 'tsho ba ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba lags/ ji ltar na ma
75a7(1): bsags pa sogs pa lags/ ji ltan na bsags 'a chung byi gzon pa lags// bka' saHsad pa/ nye bar 'cho ba myed pa ni bdud dang mu stegs can thams cad kyis klags kyi rnyed pa'o// sems
75a8(1): thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ni/ dpag bsams kyi shing lta bu'o// ma bsags pa da bsags pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni phyir ro// bsags pa chud myi gzond pa ni dge ba'i sems skyes so chog byang/ 
75a9(1): chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ste/ de ni tshul lo// tshogs kyi bu dag de la sa na/ ho bus chung bar yang gyis shig// srob sa dang ldan 'ad yang gyos shig/ rten byed par yang kyis shigs dpung gnyen myed par
75b1(1): nyan ma mtsham pa lags/ bka' ba khang pa/ mangs chung ba du bya ba ni gdod skye rnams la bag yod par bya'o// skabs dang ldan par bya ba ni 'anas kyi ldan la rnam pa la bzod pas pa ga nani
75b2(1): ba'o// rten pa byed pa ni so so dang gos shes cabs so// dpung chen myed pa ni gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa ste/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na/ dang bdag na rnyog pa can tu gyi la lags
75b3(1): rnyog pa can dag ni dang bar gyis shig/ rnyog pa myed pa yang gyis shig// rtag tu dang 'ang yang gyis shig/ gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang brnyog pa can du
75b4(1): 'gyod pa lags// rtsi ltang na rnyog pa tsun dag na dang par bgyin da pa lags/ ci lta ban rnyog pa ma mtsham pa lags/ ji snyed na rtag tu dpa' lags/ bka' sa/ la pa// dang ba dag rnyanah+ya
75b5(1): byed pa bya tsam kya blangs pa sams ca 'ab ba pa'o// rtag tu dang pa rgyam na 'ilas khyabs ca ma lams dang nya nas rgyalaso// dgas kyi bu dag lta bsad/ phus salas 'thog pas
75b6(1): tsun pasan/ dza ga da grags bzhin du smon pa lags/ da lta na tsum zhugs kyi chung 'phar gzugs/ bka' la 'ang ba/ grags smas bzlog par 'jug par bya ba na/ khyim tha ma mas skye ba ma

81b4(1): 'gyur ba'o/ shA ri'i bu de la sems cad gang de la de banin/ gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul ba yongs su su/ sa pa dang / nges par phul ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i
81b5(1): mngon par 'dus byas pa dang / rnam par sbyind pa'i 'bras bu bde ba/ 'dod pa dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i dang ldan pa dang dad pas yongs su phul ba'i bsags pas/ tshe 'di nyid la sengs/ ca
81b6(1): kyi nges pad sengs pa gsum thob ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ de 'di snyas du sems te/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod pa bya ste/ lus thub pa'i snying po dang / 
81b7(1): snying po ma yin pa'i lus shes par byas la/ snying po sbyin par bya'o snyam nas/ longs spyod rnams la dmyigs pa can du shes te/ snying po myed pa'i longs spyod rnams la snying po sbyin par byed pa 'di ni sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshe
81b8(1): gas pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa byas pa'i/ sems ca kyi nges par sems pa dang po'o// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te// bdag gi bsod nams kyi zhing bla na myed pa yon gnas/ sbyin pa mchog sen po sa mad
81b9(1): pa byas pas/ tsha/ bdag sa sems can dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pa 'om/ shini rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa myed do// bdag gi 'gro ba med pa nis ho/ mthor mi rob pa 'am/ mthong ba
82a1(1): bu gnan yang de lazhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mang bye 'bu pa yongs su phul pa sa yang dge bar gnas 'a de yin 'di gas te bdag gis sbyin btsun no// bdag gi'i 'dzad na las dag kyang byas 'o// banan gis
82a2(1): spangs so ltal du de ltar rab tu shes shing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni sbyin 'pho yin ya/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa sbyin no// snyam dud lta sems shing gtong ba la yongs su gdung ba byed brnyas pa byed do// sha r-i'i bu rdo
82a3(1): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod rten mchod pa byas pa'i sems kyi sems pa thob pa gsum pa'o// sha ri'i bu rigs kyi bu dgas kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar mye dbul ba phul ba bas/ 'tsho ba'i dus kyi tshe
82a4(1): sdang ba gsum thob ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ dge legs byas pa mngon tu gyur te/ dran pa yob cing dge ba rnams brjed par gyi 'gyur te/ sha ri'i bu 'di ltar 'chi ba'i 'dus kyi na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ 
82a5(1): rnam sa su ca pa 'ad 'ad da / gang dan 'di gagags 'od/ nas ma kya pa nanas pas kyi/ na pa rba 6/  nas rgya
82a6(1): la mchod pa byas so zhes mchog tu dga' 'thob te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pa 'don rje ba gnyis pa'o// sha ro'i bu gzhan yang sems can de 'tsho ba'i dus
82a7(1): kyi tshe/ sems can gzhan sbyin pa gtong ba mthong na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis mar me phul ba shul lo// phyis kyang sbyin pa byin ni snyam spyod gtong ba'i sems skyes shing / sdug bsngal gyi tshod pa rnams kyis kyi 'phrogs
82a8(1): la/ de 'chos rjes su dran pa de lta bu 'byung ste/ sha ri'i bu 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ba bzhin du yid la byed pa 'di ni snang ba thob pa gsum pa yin no// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gan/ 
82a9(1): gas pa'i mchod rten lamar gyi dbul ba yul ba de'i cha'a'i dus kyi de/ sdang ba yan sab ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mdun na nyi ma dkyil 'khor 'char ba mthong ba dang / mdun na zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba mthong ba dang / lda khod
82b1(1): laganas nga/ bal ma sbyang 'byab pa mangs / gna'i bu bzhin gshegs pam mtsho sbyin la ma 'i dbul ba sral ba ba'i 'dus kyi/ snang ba'an nams par 'gyur ro//  sa
82b2(1): de skad ces bka' saHya to// bde bar gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs nas// de bzhin du stond pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' saN+Dal da to// mtha' yas chos bdag drang srong chen po'o// mchod rten rnams la mkhas
82b3(1): pa gang zhig gis mar mye dbul ba yul byas pa'i las de yis// bde dang don dang brnyed pa mtha' yas thob// de ni 'chi kar dran pa nyams kyi 'gyur// mar me phul ba 'ang bdag nyid mthong bar 'gyur// zang zing skye
82b4(1): pa'i dga' ba bzhi yang thob// 'chi ba'i dus tshe rnga rmongs pa myed par 'gyur// kun nas snang ba dag kyang des shes te// nyi ma dang ni zla ba 'ang mthong bar 'gyur// bye ba khrag khrig lnga rnams des mthong 'gyur/ 
82b5(1): rmongs pa byed par sangs rgyal chos kyang sA// de la pa mthun dang rtsa lag dang 'khor rnams kun gyis bskor nas du na yang / de rnams ldanani mngon tu de myi phyog pa// de chen pa yang dran panyam
82b6(1): 'gyur// thub pa'i skyes mchog rnams la mchod byas pas/ de ske mo byang chub snying 'od bde gshegs dang / des ni bdag kyang thal mo spyan byas shing // lha byin rnams kyis mdun pa dang mthong // gul dang bcas par/ 
82b7(1): 'jig rten 'dren par 'thong // de der phyi nad te 'di bar gshegs mthong nas dga' bas de tshe spyan 'dren par byed// de yis gdugs chod sbyar la gnang bar mdzad// so so bskyed pa'o 'de bas tshil gyur nas// 
82b8(1): chus byas che sdug bsngal des rgya myong // byang chub dam pa mnog la sems kyang dga'// de la 'chi ba'i 'jigs chen 'byung gyi 'gyur// mar bye phul ba'i yon yon 'di yin te// 'ji dus byas khye de ni dran pa nyangs/ 
82b9(1): myi 'gyur// de la phyogs rnams snang bar 'gyur// sngon chad ma mthong gzugs bzang rnams kyang mthong // de ni 'chi nas mthol ris nges 'gro zhing // lnga'i stan la de lus 'dug par shes/ rgyal ba ya ni mchod/ 
83a1(1): dag par 'thun pa dang / de nas par sna snyan pa thos par 'gyum ba dang / de 'khor yi 'de ba yang ba dang ldan par 'gyur ma'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces bka' 'a te/ byede par gshegs pa'ade ga ces gdun
83a2(1): nas/ de bzhin du sond pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drang srong mchod rten mar bye phul bas ni// de'i lus ni rab tu 'od gsal zhing / gzhan gyis kyi tshugs dpal dang ldan pa dang / lA gadza gan ga
83a3(1): bod de gyu dad to// lha'i sgra dbyangs snyan cing yid 'ong tho/ 'di lha gzhan de bzhin 'di yang mchog/ dran dang blo mchog dang ni ldan pa dang // 'khor mchog phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ gang tu lha'i bu der ni
83a4(1): 'gro ba der// der 'gro ba na lnga kun 'dod par byed// gang gis de lus 'di ltar 'od 'bad// sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu de byed 'gro'o// bskyed mos 'tshas gyi bzhin shing kyi phyir// tha ma
83a5(1): ces bya gAzhas myed khang gis brgyand// zla ba ci ltar kun nas gsal ba ltar// de ni shing rnams de bzhin gsas pa yinamer mye 'bad 'a' ji bzhin nam gsal ya/ yid 'od dri dang phyogs
83a6(1): rnams gtong byed de/ ga masnyom gsal pa 'din myong nas// lharnam pa pom ma thong rnyed 'dzind par 'gyur// de'i 'khad tshogs kyi tag de dag gis/ brgyad pa byas pas de dag mdzes par 'gyur// bye ba kham
83b1(1): can lnga dad de/ tu mgapa' banan byan ma 'ang sadang / shar 'atsu rlo bzhin na gakan mnaman rten pa/ ma sa dbus paphyu bya// sna brgyam sa kyi ga zhis tu skyeg das// da / 
83b2(1): gtsug nang / gnas de nas 'tha' bab tu/ gsos nas na da / log par srung ba sathabar gyi la ste/ kyil danan tu skyes dayang // rigs kyi mdzan btsud pa dang pa dang rnad kyi
83b3(1): rgyab 'byung ba dang ldan par skye 'ang 'gyur ro// gal te sangasu rgyas rgya myi 'byung ba zhig sa bab na yang de sdig pa'i ga ba cen ma yin zhing / ya mtshan du 'dzid pa dang / bral ba'i rigs bu ste ba cun
83b4(1): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa'ad te/ bde ban gshegs pas de gdang ces gsungs nas/ de bzhin su stod pas gzhan yang 'di ska ces dka' stsal to// zhwa'i srid par bdag na lud ring
83b5(1): drig gnas par 'gyur zhes de'i gis 'di 'jug/ lhag cid yis de yang nab tu zhes/ den tu ma gang chen gyi pa'i drul ni 'bab 'gyur ba/ de ma mtshan ma lnga dag 'gyur pa/ de mas can ma lnga dag gzung 'gyur te/ 
83b6(1): ba phrag mang lha dag der 'dus shing / de dag mngon sum de ni chos kyang stonod/ bdag ni 'di nas ring por gyi thogs 'chi// srid pa thams cad myi rtag bde ba myed// gzhan dag 'chi zhing gzhan dag skye bar 'gyur// kye sa
83b7(1): 'a na na 'chi bar 'gyur nga nas duni bus 'jug gini tu phyib 'drasmra/ des sangag gtsug nams dang de bzhin du// lha gzha su krug bsngal nyams pan go// denas bdag kro sa ni ldeng dag/ nan na/ 
84a1(1): 'jig rten du ni 'dod par 'gro// de'i rang la yod pa'i dran gyi nyam sa deng yang bde 'ar 'gyur gyi sdug bsngal phyin// skyes nas tshe rabs mas tu dran 'byur te/ skyes pa rag tu mun gyi khrod pa shes pa// nyon thongs
84a2(1): bkyis bdag la gnod 'gyur zhes// shin tu sdug bsngas der yang dga' ba myed// lha'i 'jig rten thob pa'i dpal dran nas// myi'o 'jig rten la ni bde myi rnyed// mtho' des sdug bsngal gyi yul smos ci zlos
84a3(1): rjod pa thams cad stong po byed cing g.yo'o// gang dang gang tshe sum sa bras nyam sa gyur pa// deme de ni rab tu byung bar dang / 'di yang de'i nasangs sbyin 'gyur ba te/ nam tog spyod par nas dang gyi 'bru
84a4(1): 'gyur// bya ba ni 'os myin las ni de myi gyod/ gdo na gyi za bar de ni khyim nas 'brung long bar myi 'gyur na por
84a5(1): gyi 'gyur zhing // de ni smyig chol myed par 'gyur ma yin nang can ma yin 'jigs rung sgra ldan byin// blun pon rgya 'gyur gyi shes kyi 'gyur ro// myig byed par ni nam yang kyi
84a6(1): 'gyur zhing // de'i phyag ni na bar 'gyur ma yin myig gcig pa ma yin zhon long dmyig ma yin// de'i myog la gyi gsas byed par 'gyur// myig ni ring nga ning gnag la rnam par gsal// srid
84a7(1): 'ang de'i myig ni dag par 'gyur// nor bu 'od bzang ltar ni don zhig rtogs// bska lad pa myed grangs myed dag tu rnams kyang de'i// sha'i byig ni yongs su nyams kyi 'gyur// de la byig nang
84a8(1): dag ni myi 'byung zhing // mar me phul ba'i rnam sbyin de yin no// de bzhin lag brtsis gzugs dang /  rtog ge rnams// rtogs par khong chud bzod ldan 'jigs pa myed// de ni mdzangs la blor
84b1(1): ldan par 'gyur// blo ni shin du ma tha don nam mthong / srid pa dag la byed pa myed pa yang // rgyal ba'i sman sa snang ba thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin 'jig rten 'dren pa sangs rgyas mthong // mthong nan
84b2(1): dad pas mchod pa rab tu 'byed// gzugs kyi dngos po bzang dang mardzes par 'gyur// mdza' bshes dang ni rtsa lag skye bo dga'// phrug cing stobs ldan nor ni mang bar 'gyur// / byo byed 'khor da ni phun
84b3(1): sum mtshogs pa 'thob// ji ltar mar mye mun pa bsal nas su// kun la snod kyis snang ba khyab pa ltar// de bzhin kun snang ba byas nas lha'i de'o mun pa'i dbang ni nges par de myi 'gro// sangs rgya
84b4(1): mchod rnyed la myi gang gis// sems cani dang bas mang mye'i 'phreng che mar me phul bas sems/ ni rnam dag cing // / de ni 'jig rtenarig pa'i mchog 'gyur// be lta na sdug cing rab tu mdzes
84b5(1): par 'gyur // 'jig rten kun gyi dga' ba skyed par 'gru skad ma gyi 'dod lag shis 'dod ma yin/ nayan phyogs pa den rten gyi 'gyur// de ni 'jig rten log ste gang dag dang
84b6(1): kham gol gang dag yin pa der myi mos// rgyal phran tsam gyis chog par de 'dzind cing // su dang / yang ni 'thab tu 'gro mya byed// tshe byung myed cing mya ngan myed par 'gyur// de'i sems la yongs su yi ched rkye
84b7(1): de la yid myi ched par myi 'gyur la// bsam pa ngan dang / gnod pa byed myed// rgyal po'i pho/ phrad gang tu de smra ba// rgyal po dang ni rgyal 'khor grags par gyurapa// sbyar badra nad kyis rnams kyang de kyi theg+sa
84b8(1): za bar myi 'gyur ma ning 'thun gyi yin// legs par gnas shing 'di dang ldan gyur da la// dang lus la nang rnams 'byung gyi 'gyur// gyis ma duni sdig pa rgya phyil// des ni rngo sa nyon pa de ci shes/ de
84b9(1): ni yang dang yang du gter rnyed de/ bder gshegs mchod rten mnod pas de ltar 'gyung ma yin// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod rten la mar me dbul ba phul ba ni sems can de ni 'dund pa pan thob nye zhi bzhi gang zhe na/ 
85a1(1): bul// de'i lus rdzogs pa dang stobs ched 'gyur// de ni nams kyang rtsod pa snyen gyi byed// dbang phyug tshungs pa myed pa/ phyogs skyon drang srong chen po'i mchod rten mar me phus rnam par grags pa'i yongs khyod nub dang
85a2(1): yon tan mchog ldan rab mchod khyim du ste// skyes nas che dbus dran pa nyid du 'gyur/ yog 'khor yun sum tshogs pa mchod ldan 'gyur// srog chag sa sa rtag tu snyid bzo byed// rtag ca gyi gargya shin tu nga bar 'gyu
85a3(1): rnam sdur 'gro ba'i khyim dud kyi sbyi/ sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul ba phus pa bas// yongs su dag pa bzhi rob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / dag mdzas
85a4(1): su dag pa dang / yid yongs su dag pa dang / mdza' ba zhes yongs/ su dag pa'o// na ri'i bu rigs kyi 'am// rigs kyi bu maud skye ba'i gnas de dang / de dag tu smras pa na/ thog gcod
85a5(1): bar 'gyur te/ de srog gcod pa myi byed do// sa byin par gyi sen 'dod pa log par myi gses pa spong bar 'gyur te//  gi chung ma la yang 'dzud pa rgya spyod do// 'bru'i chang dang / btsam
85a6(1): ba'i chang btung ba spong bar byed do// sems can gang sa yang dbyug pa 'am/ mtshon cha 'am bod pa 'am/ khur tshur ram/ mtshon char ram gyurd pa gang yang rung bas rnam par 'tshe bar myi byed cing // de sdig pa myi
85a7(1): dge ba'i chos rnams las ldog par 'gyur te/ sha ri'i bu de dag ni sus kyis// yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o// de la dag yongs su dag pa gang zhe na// de brdzun tu smra ba spangab yin te/ de ma mthong ba 'am/ ma thos
85b1(1): yang 'arjod par gyi byed la/ mthong ba dang / bam pa rnaMs pa yang dus ma yin par smra bar bya byed do// des mthong ba 'am// zas pa drin na yang dag par smra ba byed// de bdag gad dang / kunan kya na
85b2(1): tu yang rung / log par gyi ste'o// gzhan dag gis brgyan tu smra ba 'acol pa'i cha yang dag par shes na bded pa srung bar byed de// ngag ni yongs sre ma dag pa de dag 'a slong bar byed do// de na dbye
85b3(1): phyir 'di nas thol pa pa brgya stod// de dag dbye ba'i phyir po ban/ dathos par 'dir gyi stod// bathun pa rnams ni yid gzugapar byed cing bye ba rnams la ni snam ma byed// dodag tshub shA
85b4(1): pa yon te/ ngag gang na ma 'debs pa/ brlang ba// gzhanas byung ba/  gzhanas gyi 'de// myi mug pa kyi 'dod pa/ rkyen 'di kyi'ong / gzhan sa gad pa/ 'do du 'dzi pa na
85b5(1): lta bu spangs na/ ngag mnyen pa/ 'jam pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ bden pa/ nar snyan pa/ snying du sdug pa/ mdza' bar gyur dpa/ skye bo mang po sa 'dod pa/ dga' ba/ yid du 'ong ba/ dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa de/ 
85b6(1): bu'i ngag smra'o// de tshig byas pa spangs pa yin te/ de spang bar bya ba gzhan dang myi smra ba yin/ de gzhan gyi lag kyis dang / brda' sbed par byed do// de mang du smra bar gyi byed// dus ma yin par smra bar myi byed do// mya ngan
85b7(1): las 'das pa dang / myi ldan pa'i chog gyi spya ste/ de ltar de dag gi sas yongs su ma dag pa'i spong ba 'di ni sha ri'i bu dag gi las yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o// de yid kyi las yongs su ma dag pa spong ba yin te// de brnab sems
85b8(1): su mya byed cing/ de gzhan gyi nor dang / gzhan gyi rdzas dang / gzhan gyi yo byad dag la brnas sems myi bskyed do// de gnod sems spong ba din pa yin no// log par lta ba yang spong ste/ sdig pa'i lta ba can ma yin no// de ltam
86a1(1): rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams dang / bsnyen cing bsnyen bkur byed de// sha ro'i bu 'dan yongs su dag pa zhi ba rtse/ mnga' bags yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o// ga ro'i bu de bzhin gshegs mchod rten pa rje
86a2(1): ba phus pas yongs su dag pa bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' sastsal te/ bde 'ar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ de bzhin du ston pa gzhan yang de skad ces 'ga'
86a3(1): na sa satham sa rnamabyed chul ma rnan pasakhyenan pa sa sa/ 
86a4(1): ya// nye bzhin phyogs rnams suni shin tu gsal/ deyis zag pa zad la myur du shes// de'i blo ni rdzu 'phrul che ba la gyur/ swa byig dus dang bral zhing 'ag pabyed// blo ldan de/ 
86a5(1): yin 'jig rten sems rnams dang / lha'i mngon shes so sor rig pa shes// 'dod na nyan thos byang chub rnyed myi dka'// yad me phul ba'i rnam sbyin de yin no// drang srong cheran po'i mchod rten mar me phul/ gas te bangan
86a6(1): rgyas byang chub 'dod na 'ang sla/ d+mo ldan pa la gsum can nyams pa myed/ shes rab myig ldan longs spyod chen por 'gyur/ sha ri'i bu theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mon
86a7(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten pa mar me dbul ba phul na/ skye ba'i gnas de dang de dag tu 'dun par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi mchog brgyad thob ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ shi ba'i myig mchog thob pa dang / dran pa ltar myi mthong ba 'thob
86b1(1): pa dang / bsgom yongs su rdzogs par des par 'byed pa'i cha dang / mthun pa'i wA'i phyag mchog thog pa dang / gas rab yongs su rdzogs pas/ tshul khrim pa pa skyed pa 'dol pa dang / ljon pa yon nams thas gas pas 'tho'as
86b2(1): 'thob pa dang / bsod nams legs par bsags pa'i del ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi phyog tu gyu dad pas/ sangs rgyab 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / sha ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am
86b3(1): rigs kyi bu mos mar me phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bam des/ 'khor los bsgrur ba'i rgyal srid 'thob ste// des yang zhe 'gras pangar byed pa'i yid dang ldan 'ang mchog tu stan sdug par 'gyur ba 'am/ lnga'i dbang po brgya
86b4(1): byin rdzu 'phrul chen po 'thob cing myig stong dang ldan pa 'thob da par 'gyur ba 'am/ tshangs pa'i gnas la mkhas pa'i tshad sa par yang 'gyur te/ grags pa'i bsam gtan 'job par
86b5(1): 'gyur ba ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pas 'dund par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi mchog brgyad po de dag 'thob bo// gzhan yang chos brgyad po 'thob ste/ brgyad po/ 
86b6(1): gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan dpag tu byed par 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dpag tu myed pa gathob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dpag myed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims
86b7(1): dpag tu byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin dpag tu byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi shes rab dpag tu byed pa dang rnga sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol pa dgag tu byed pa dang / sems can gyi b.lam pa sa
86b8(1): bsam pa pag tu myed pa la 'jug la 'tho nye/ sha ri'i bu ma ma phul bas ni lang na' par sbyind pa dpag tu byed pa yongs su bzung ba yin no// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshes
86b9(1): bamachom 'chad 'an bya ma mtshar 'chad da/ kye ma mo/ chos rab tu ston to/ zhes mam med 'bral bu'i bus pa'i ma ma rjes su bzung bas rgyas kyi man mo rjes su 'drid par byed do// de yang be lus bu rlon
87a1(1): dge ba'am pa de ga chog sa dpag skyed pa brgyad rab te/ brgyad gangazhe na/ drad par chogs dpag tu byed partsal pa dang bde gzhin du rmya / zla zab rgya chog 'a dang / ded ma chog da dang / bzod dru
87a2(1): rgya tshogs dang / gas rab tu chogs dang / ti 'dzin kyi tshogs dang / spos pa'i tshogs dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu byed pa kun na // tshigs dpas kyi byed pa brgyan pa do ga non pa 'awar ro/ 
87a3(1): soso yang dag par rig bzhi yang 'thob ste/ rim gyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i mang
87a4(1): rgyas la/ de dang ba'i sems kyis thal mo spyad bar bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de su mchog tu 'byung ba brgyad thob ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs mchog tu 'byung ba 'thob pa dang / g.yog 'khor mchog tu 'byung
87a5(1): pa 'thob pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu 'byung ba dang / lha dang / phyi rnams su skye ba mchog tu byed pa dang / dad pa mchog tu byung ba dang / spobs pa mchog tu byung ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa'i 'phags pa'i la
87a6(1): rdzob pa dang / blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdona'ang rdzogs par 'tshang bya'o// ga ro'i bu de ci'i phyir dpag tu/ byed pa zhes bya zhe na// de bzhin gshegs pa la des mchod pan
87a7(1): 'bras bu dpag tu byed pa'i 'bras bu dpag tu byed pa'i phyir te/ phan yon dpag tu myed pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du 'acam/ byos mngon par 'byung ba gyis// sangs
87a8(1): rgyas pastand pa la brtson par byos// 'dam bu'i khyim na glang chen bzhin// / 'chi bdag sde rnams gzhom par gyis// shes ched du brjod par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la / 
87a9(1): sarbal da pa/ sha ri'i bu chos lnga po 'di dag ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ myar skye ba'i thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba dang / des mngon par dga' ba dang / tshul khrims
87a10(1): yongs su rdzog pa dang / zag pa zad pa ste/ sha ri'i bu chos lnga po de dag ni sems cad thams cad kyis mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin te/ de dag ni khyed rnams kyis rdob mi nad no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
87b1(1): ces bka' sam ya te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs nas// de bzhin du sond pa gzhan yang bka' saHkhad to// byang chub don phyir sems can phan 'dogs pas// bder gshegs mchod rten 'bum
87b2(1): ba di phul byas/ mkhas pa de yis byas pa'i las de ni/ tshe rabs kun tu khyad par can 'du 'gyur// 'di nas 'chi 'phos lha myis bsngags pa'i// yang srid dam pa de ni 'thob par 'gyur// ri rab bzhin du de myi nan
87b3(1): 'od zer dag gis phyogs kun snang zhing mdzes// lA rnam pa tshogs rnams kyis mthong nas gus dang bcas// mchog tu gus pas de la dge' ba bskyed// stod pa byed cing de la mchod pa byed// yang dang yang
87b4(1): bya sta bas ngoms pa myed// bsod nams mtshan byas de ni skes mchod 'os// tshangs pa'i gnas na tshangs pa mdzes pa 'dra/ tsA las cig nges par de bstend na// gang gis lus ni shani tu
87b5(1): 'angs/ 'don bsod nams kyi 'dod su zhig yod// 'phags pa'i tshul khrims mkhas pa su rgya nad// nub pa mthong na bas phyi ngom te/ tsha ba 'os nas ni su zhig bag tu byed/ bgyi'i
87b6(1): 'jig rten gnas tshe de yis no// bde gshegs mchod rten mar me phus byas shing // bde bar gshegs kyi snyan sa gnas byas pas 'di ni lha mchog rnyed pa legs par rnyed// mye'i lus ni bdag gis thob gyur can
87b7(1): rgyal ba'i stan la dad pas mchos so na shog/ gal te bag byed gyur du lus 'dang rgya// chos kyi dam pa 'dod par yongs gyur da/ phyi lus rnyed par dga' ba tho gyur nas/ blun rnams ci phyir dang gdon gyi byed pa de
87b8(1): gshegs can la gdod byed pa'ang ldan na// shinas ga yangs chen por srung bar 'gyur// de'i 'byodad pa rgya chen lngas thos nas spyo ba skyes te smon lam 'debs byed pa// phyi'i khrus ni bdag gis tho gyur da cig
87b9(1): me shA mdon gyud danas tshang sa nas gyod bdag thobashog/ 'chi ba'i rum khyed kye yang de bzhin du/ chom la phan zhing semams g.yas zud cig/ gamyong bye ba ma mo rnams bcas yang // de na bdag gi yon nas
88a1(1): bsngags pa'i lte de ga las gang 'gro ba// de dang der ni gzugs bzang rnams kyang mthong // gyi sdug gzugs ngan rnams kyang myi mthong ste/ rgyal ba'i mchod rten mar me phul bas 'gyur// de nas shi 'ams skyen
88a2(1): srid pa 'dir/ dran dang ldan bzhin ma'i mngal na gnas// btsum nas gnas nas shi 'phos tshe rabs dran// 'phags pa'i ye shes stobs las nyams myi 'gyur// bde gshegs mchod rten mar me phul byas pas
88a3(1): de yis las byas pa ni de nyid kyi/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i myi bdag stobs chen ldan// yid 'ong gzugs pabang lhan dga' bar 'gyur// de'i sa las byas pa des tshe ring 'gyur// gcig tu dga' ba nyid kyi
88a4(1): bde dang ldan// de'i lus ni nad kyis skyon gyi spongs// mad me phul ba'i rnam sbyin de yin no// bde bar gshegs pa'i mer me mchod byas pas// rkun po'i gnod myed rgyas po'i chad pa myed// gshed ma skyed/ 
88a5(1): cing chungs byab byed/ de ni las kyi rnams kyang naze rgyudagyur// bde zhing lo'i gas gang du'am 'jigs pa byed gartag tu 'apyod cing legs 'byor dan 'bru ldan// de yis pasgyid
88a6(1): mos 'tsha' mchog 'phreng ba dang / mtsha' dang shing phran tshang / ma sna tshogs brgyand// de'i sa 'jig rten rtsopo sangs rgyas mthong // mthong nas kyang ni mchog tu dgar 'gyur te/ de dag rnam
88a7(1): pa zhus par de mchod byed// rgyal rjid spangs nas dge' slong nyid la brten// bsngags pa mtha' yas gzigs pa mtha' yas shing // mtha' yas rdo ldan de gshegs mchod rten la/ mar me sus pan/ 
88a8(1): mams yas blo ldan 'gyur/ ma pa bzhin du phyogs rnams kun tu gsas/ dam po chen pos skyes ma che gzug pa'i// mchod rten gsal byas nas dag myig gis ni// byang chub drus bral gzug sa byed popa dang / 
88a9(1): ni phyogs kun tu 'ad me phul bas na// nam gros blo mnga' stobs bcu rnams ldan zhing // de bzhin ma 'dres chos kyi pha rol da byon/ kun nas spyan ldan bde gshegs pas 'gyur// phyogs rnams na bgrang bya/ 
88b1(1): 'dzin rnyed khams/ zla gang dag tu snyed yod pa la sus pa// mar me lta bur phyi'i'o rgyu yin ni// ma lum pa dag sdug tu snang byas 'gyur// bdag nyid ces mar sa bum pa 'a'o// mazu 'thung ga na
88b2(1): bra ni de yid do// ma ma 'brab dag gi sems cad kun// lhag byas ka khyi mthu chen dod dal mthod // dang rgya ba rnams su gyu da la de mchod cid// gcig 'ga' 'das ga'ab par byas gyur dpa// ma mi ma
88b3(1): snying po ri reb tsam byas shing // de yis 'jig rten ma lus byed la// nam pa de 'dras mtha' yas phyogs kun tu gas te ma me dbul bar byed gyur da la// rang rgyal byan chub tun ston sems kyis// bskas pa brgya
88b4(1): brag mtha' yas 'bang byed pas gang zhig byang chub ni smon sems kyis// mchod rten mchog sa rdza mes gsas byed na// de bas dri mchog 'bras bu ches me zhes/ dod dam gzigs pa sangs rgyas rnabs gsu
88b5(1): ngas so// phyogs bcu'i skye bo gang dag dpag myed pa/ rang sangs rgyas nyid mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir// re res de bzhin mar me rnams phul zhing // bskasad pa grangs byed de dga' bar byed la
88b6(1): 'jog rten ched du ba gshegs nyid 'dod cing // gang zhig 'jig nyon dam pa'i mchod rten la// mar me bu'i lam lan cig byas 'chas na// de bas 'di bsod 'bras bu khyad par 'gags// sangs
88b7(1): rgyas khyod nga yul mthong dga' bsam gyi khyab// thos nas dang dga' ba skyed par byed// dad myed chos mchog ma thob byis / rnams// zhum zhum por ni gning du byed par 'gyur// de phyir 'jig rten kun mgon gang yin
88b8(1): ba// dge chos spyod yul can rnams rnyed dka' bas// thu ba rnams spyan sngar shind du dang sems kyis// sangs rgyas nyid kyi ched du smon lam thob// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' sa/ lad nas/ tshe dang ldan
88b9(1): ba sha ri'i bu dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / swA dang / myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags
88b10(1): pa mar me 'phul ba zhes bya ba'i theg pa'i mdo'i rdzogs s+ho// @//  // rgya gar gyi mkhan po prad ta bar ma dang / zhu can gyi so tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes las sogs pas/ bsgyur
89a1(1): drang chub tu gtan la phab zugs dang / khril mgod pa na bya gsan/ bdan dang/ dpas kyi lam tshan po srung bab dang / rangs kya dang / byed chug mam dma'
89a2(1): cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag zos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po mang thas di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po 'a nganas
89a3(1): pa spyan ras gzi gas dbang phyug dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po saphags pa bya/ 
89a4(1): ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa rnam sel dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / 
89a5(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
89a6(1): dpa' thar 'o 'jig babams cad pa'ang 'a dang ti bzhi na no chub sem 'das sems dpa zera'odag byed kyi bsra ge bar bathad 'chang ba dang /  byang chub sem 'dasas
89a7(1): nem 'a dang chen po'i 'do nams kyi mtshan thams cad 'chang ba dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 'ja' dpa sa gno nur gyur dpa dang de dag 'as bsogs pa bska'adab bamang ba'i byang
89a8(1): chub se'as dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad byangs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas kyang / chub sems dpa' 'asas dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan mas gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das gas
89a9(1): deng badzin gyi sa tsan 'du sa tshag sa tshan 'argyan 'ad / phyog sa na sa/ mabam sa kyi sa sa skyes /  rnasas gas
89b1(1): bcom ldan 'das la mod dmas pargya stong dumam brgyan 'ang/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye bsnyed kyis yongs su bsod ste/ brgya byi dang / ras pa dang / 'dig nyid pyong 'thams cad kyis brgo 'i bags
89b2(1): dpas kyi rnam chen mo la gzigs nam+ba/ tshangs ma chen po'i dbyangs kyis byang chub sems da 'i mas dpa' chen po 'a sams pa spyan san gajigs dbang thug la 'di da ces bka' sa 'ang // kun ras gzigs dag
89b3(1): zug sa rgyal po 'am/ blon po pal/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma gas/ dge bsnyen nas/ dge snyen pa 'al/ bras ze 'am/ rgyal dgos sas/ rje shemasas/ dmangs rigs gangs sa/ dpas kyi rnams kyi 'tshul
89b4(1): dri ma myed par grags pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa 'chang na// rgyal rin das kyi rgyal po'i de'i yus dang / semams came de dag gi 'jigs pa dang / yams kyin// gnod pa thams cad ni bur 'gyur zhing / chom rkun dang / rdong
89b5(1): spu can dang / myi dang / mya pa yin pa'i 'jigs pa thamasacad byung bar myi 'gyur te/ nor dang / bru dang / mdzod dang nabang ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po
89b6(1): de'i snang das cagasas na 'gyur // de nas byeng chub des sas das chen po da na to//  na 'di sdigs pa
89b7(1): legs po legs so// dpal gyi lha mo chen mo'i mying rnams 'chang ba dang / zos nas nyams su lend pa gang de legs pa de dag gi yon tan bsngags pa gang sags de lta bur 'gyur ba'i tshig 'di legs par gsungs so/ 
89b8(1): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi sna mos dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du skyed// 'acom
89b9(1): ldang 'das kyis bkal sa 'da'/ dpal gyi ske mo chen mos ni de bzhin gshegs pa gang 'ga'i gling gi bye ma snyed la dge tsha ba bskyed de te// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus na// 'jig rten kha'ang / 
89b10(1): rin po che las byung ba zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho'i byi du r+ya dang / gser gi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ de dang de bzhin gshegs pa
90a1(1): mang po gzhan dag ma yang drangs kyi po chen mos dge ba'i tha btsud do// 
90a2(1): khams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'jab pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'byed pa dang / thod pa thams cad ni bar byed pa dang / pha ros tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ldan 'di ste na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpas thu
90a3(1): phyag 'tshal so// de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai du rgya dang / gser gyi ro 'o mdog mdzes gser 'od dpas su phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i bu stegs kyi sgothams cad kyi bkra
90a4(1): gis kyi dalabs phyag 'tsham 'o// de bzhi gshegasas sa kyi ga gapa'i 'a na du kyan pangs byas yode ga gshegs ca dang dgas lasanas pa gyu ba zhi sa
90a5(1): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba'i dkyi'i'akhor dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs 'chosagyi cho 'phrul/ rgyal mtshan thugs kyi da'al la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
90a6(1): gshegs pa skar 'od zhi ba 'idapal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam bzhi 'ang mdzad pa'i sku'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam rgya mtsho snang ba'i dpas la phyag 'tshal lo
90a7(1): de bzhin gshegs pa shinang tu yongs brjod mtshan gso'ad da 'a sal phyag mtshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir myi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dani po chu'i gnas kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyis
90a8(1): 'khor 'od 'phags dpa' la phya ma mtshal la'o// de bzhin gshegs la brtson 'grus paskang yas la rab tu bzhugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu byed pa'i gser mchog ldang ba'i dpa'
90b1(1): de bzhin gshegs pa sred byed kyi bu'i tshul zhugs kyi go Na ri rab kyi dpal sa phyag 'tshas so// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug chen po'i di'il ra byan
90b2(1): so// de bzhin gshegs pa gnyi zla 'od dpal sa phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo'i chos kyi 'od kyi rgyal po'i dpas sa phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i smon ma
90b3(1): 'od bzangs dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gnyi 'od tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi sgron ma'i dpa' sa phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs brgya tshon
90b4(1): snying po las byung ba'i dbas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshe de rtaga' ba susad pa'i 'brug snga snyan pa 'di las la phyag 'tshal 'o// de bzhin gagogs pa chos kyi snang ba'i thams cad bgad pa'i
90b5(1): depal phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shing gyi rgyal po ltar skyes pa'i dpas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin po rtse bar ba'i ri'i dbal la phyag 'tshal so// de bzhin gshegs pa sa/ 
90b6(1): shes 'bar ba'i rgya mtsho'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// smon lam gyi shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i tog gi rgyal po'i
90b7(1): dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nor dang // 'bru thams cad 'du ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
90b8(1): gshegs pa zhi ba 'dren pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum tshogs pa dgrag pa'i dpas lang phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag ri mod byas te/ bcang bar bya'o/ 
90b9(1): bklag par bya'o// de ltar byas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dpal snga mo chen mo yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan te/ dpal gyi/ 
90b10(1): dpal gyi rnam chen po myod rtswa 'ongs pa'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal rin pa chos so sor brgyand pa zhes bya bar / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
91a1(1): rgyabadapa 'i dar bu na 'i cesas byung ba zhes bya bar 'jug/ 'jig rten gyilam desang wA' rin pa sa tshogs kyis brgyanan par 'gyur no ka 'jig nyid gyi lam don pan dan gnon nar da
91a2(1): snang bar mdzad par 'gyur la 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sem med pa 'dag kyang rang las 'od byung zhing che dpag tu byed par 'gyur ro// gnas mkha' las kyang sanga' tshung
91a3(1): chos dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra 'byung 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang pad ma'i snying po dag las skyes par 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan/ 
91a4(1): te/ de'i rgyud bcu gnyis pali mya brgya lnga brgyad dri ma myed par grags pa zhes bya ba'i sod pa gang zhe na/ 'jigs pa myed pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po// dpal gyi lha mo'i mying rnams nyon cig/ 
91a5(1): 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum// lha thams cad kyi me/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbus/ byang chub sems dbang thams cad
91a6(1): kyi dpal// 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi dpal tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po thams cad/ da kyi dpal/ lnga las sogs pa thams cad kyi dpal/ gnas thas
91a7(1): cad yod pa'i dpa'/ lA dang / g+hu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za/ skye dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang so phye chen po thams cad kyi dpa'/ rigs sngags 'chang dang / lag/ 
91a8(1): no rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dngas/ 'jigs sbyong 'i gzho dang / lnga'i dpal gza' brgyad dang / rtswa skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dpas lo// oM nyi sa'i bu mo// mam/ yum dge byed pazhi'i dpa la / 
91a9(1): shis ma/ sems can rnams ky-im/ rgyal ma/ rnam par rgyal ma/ gang kA'i mi/ mu stegs kyi sgo thams cad kyi bkra shis mA/ dri ma myed pa// dri mi myed pa'i rab 'byor da dpal sdig pa thams cad 'phrog
91a10(1): rgyags pa byed pa/ zla ba'i dpa'/ nyi ma'i dpas/ gza' thams cad kyi dpa nga/ gseng ge bzhom pa/ pad ma mchog gsum gyis ga ba// padam da' ma la gnas pa/ ngan ma la 'dzin pa bdam yang
91a11(1): nga /  pa dang ldanan / 'od gathom par 'argyas 'do pa ga/ nor byin ma na rlo/  ga sto rdzo// na gdagadang / khathags panas pad padzin ma 'don pan kyi phreng po ba cams
91b1(1): rlung srong ma shes gnyen gyi bu mo// lag pa 'bum dang ldan pa phyig 'bum dang bras / mgo bo 'bum dang ldan pa/ nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa'i cod pan thogs / gzugs sa/ gzugs
91b2(1): tshogs can/ rab grags sa/ shin tu dang grags sa/ zheb sa/ sbyin 'a nyon sa sa/ thA gtsang la/ zla ba'i mdog can a nyi na'i bdog can/ dge sa/ dag byed de/ legs pa thams cad 'dong rje
91b3(1): phyogs pa'i dpal// 'phags pa me tog gi gnas/ me tog gi dbang phyug/ ri rab ri'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/ chu klung dang / mtsho thams kyi dpal/ chu thams cad kyi mtsho'i dpa' zu stegs thams cad kyi
91b4(1): mngon tu phyogs pa'idangaSha/ sman dang / me tog dang / shing dang / nos dang / 'bru thams cad kyi dpal/ gser sbyin na/ zas dang / skom sbyin pa/ 'od can na// snang 'am/ lus gcad ma/ de bzhin gshes
91b5(1): pa thams cad la dbang bsgyud ma/ lA'i tshogs thams cad la mngo/ hU~M phyogs pa'i dpal/ ka shin rnga dang / chu l+le dang / lus dan po dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i dpa' sbyin la 'dzag 'jo/ 
91b6(1): bzod pa dang / mdzums kyi gnas dag byed dang / bkra shis thams cad kyi lag pa ldan la/ badz+ra sa pa thams cad byed par byed pa/ bsod nams thams cad 'dru ba'i dngas/ sa thams cad rgyal po
91b7(1): cad kyi dpal 'byung po dang / mdod nyid dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / lto bye chen po rnams cad kyi lal/ kwa'i gnas dang rnamams kyi dpa' ba zlas yon dang / bzlas 'dod du bya ba dang / sprin dren
91b8(1): dang / sbyin 'grems su bya ba dang / bkra shis thams cad kyi dpal/ 'od la dga' ba/ shal pa dang ldan pang bsgrub pa// drang srong bams cad dga' bar byed pa'i dpas / bud byed kyi bus ngan po b+h+ri / 
91b9(1): sdug pa gnas thams cad kyi gtso mo dang / dayal kyi mchog kyi 'am ci mo thams cad dang / lA ma yin thams cad kyi dpal gyi mchog/ kha na ma tho sa byed pa'i gnas na drug pa sa yin du 'ong ba'i 'chi 'a
91b10(1): dang ma kyi rgyam tha 'dangs so// na nas smras// rangs thun gyi/ rnam sa 'i bya
